activities:
Pursuant to the EU Model Clauses

Data subjects
The personal data transferred concern the following categories of data subjects:
Customers and Clients; Complainant, Correspondents and enquirers; advisers, consultants and other professional experts; staff including volunteers, agents and casual workers; Suppliers

Categories of data
The personal data transferred concern the following categories of data:
Personal details; employment details; financial details; goods or services provided; education and training details; Family, lifestyle and social circumstances

Special categories of data (if appropriate)
The personal data transferred concern the following special categories of data:

Physical or Mental health or condition, Offences (including alleged offences)

Processing operations
The personal data transferred will be subject to the following basic processing activities:
Staff Administration
Advertising, Marketing and Public Relations
Accounts and Record Keeping

Administration of Justice (any court action taken against, or in defence against an employees, clients or providers)
Crime Prevention and Prosecution of Offenders
Education and Training
Health Administration and Services
Insurance Administration
Pension Administration
Licensing

recoursemech: For organization human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs); For all other types of data: TRUSTe EU Safe Harbor program
